article_title: On Health Reform, Trump Does Indeed Copy & Paste Other People's Work

article_metadata.description: The Daily Caller caught the Trump campaign blatantly lifting text from an oped on health care by former GOP presidential candidate Ben Carson.
article_metadata.author: Michael F. Cannon
